name: Dream Wave
description:
Submission for The Campus Game Jam 2022.

It makes use of the genre Vaporwave and combines aesthetics in a way that messes with the player's eyes. Can you spot the decoy?

Brendan Jackson - Programmer

Erin Hutton - Programmer

Taliah Naidoo - Project manager and UI

Daniel Burke - Tech Artist 

Za'yaanah Albertyn - Artist

Controls:

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Jump
